availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Courtney. Father of Catharine Courtney, John W. Courtney, Sarah A. Courtney, Rufus H. Courtney, Emila Courtney, Joseph A. Courtney. Farmer in Nelson County in 1850. Farmer in Nelson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District No. 2, p. 7.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District No. 1, p. 167.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nelson County Marriages, Film #000009668.
